Name: benign recurrent intrahepatic cholestasis 1
Definition: A benign recurrent intrahepatic cholestasis characterized by typically autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in mutation in the ATP8B1 gene on chromosome 18q.

Name: benign recurrent intrahepatic cholestasis 2
Definition: A benign recurrent intrahepatic cholestasis characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance that has_material_basis_in mutation in the ABCB11 gene on chromosome 2q31.
